animeDescription: The time is the Edo period Kansei year.Under the "Kansei Reforms" by Roujuu Sadanobu Matsudaira, the people's entertainment was severely cracked down. Everyday life is somewhat stuffy, like a bird trapped in a basket.Meanwhile, the girls who live with their own worries.At that time, history moves.A man from current Japan explodes their thoughts as "idols!"(Source: Official YouTube channel)
